detail_desc: Dress in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and small embroidery detail at the top. Short puff sleeves and a bell-shaped skirt.
Underwired lace bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly with a button and kickflare legs.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a yoke at the back.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long, cuffed sleeves. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and wide, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathers at the back of the neck to create soft draping, and a rounded hem.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Sports trousers in windproof functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a reflective print on one leg and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Lace garter with elastic and a decorative satin bow at the top.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Long jumpsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, short, wide sleeves, a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sunglasses with patterned frames made from recycled plastic and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, V-neck opening at the top and ties at the front. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative gathers at the top, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Lined.
Metal hair clips with acetate on top. Length 6.5 cm.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Leather sandals with narrow straps that tie around the ankles, and covered heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and legs that flare at the hem.

Lace balconette bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups to provide good support and a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes..
Round sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Short-sleeved jersey jumpsuit with a unique nursing feature. Deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and tapered, ankle-length legs. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, metal press-studs down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned mesh with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Extra-long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and raw edges at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a heavily draping, flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Base layer tights in soft, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Long sleeves with flounced cuffs.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.
Thin, patterned socks with a short shaft.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a button-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Ankle-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening with ties at the top and short, flounced sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Sewn-in jersey inner dress.
Large hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
All-in-one suit in soft, printed fleece with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sleeveless dresses in printed jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Lace body with a string back. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset.
Cardigan in a textured knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and decorative front pockets.
Sports shorts in fast-drying jersey with contrasting colour trims, a wide, elasticated waistband and a print motif on the front.
Soft cotton twill trousers with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, fake pockets and turn-ups at the hems.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a vest top and shorts. Printed vest top. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Decorative cushion in an organic cotton weave with a print motif on the front and solid colour back. Polyester filling. Size 22.5x32.5 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top and a tie belt. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped sparkly stone button at the top.
Fabric cap with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Playsuit in an airy viscose and linen weave with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed press-stud at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and diagonal side pockets. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Crinkled blouse in a jacquard weave with a unique nursing feature, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Flared, sleeveless top in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow shoulders straps and a gathered seam at the top. Cotton jersey lining.
Knee-length skirt in patterned satin with a regular waist, a pleat at the front, a concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem.
Cap in checked cotton with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in organic cotton jersey with a collar, buttons at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Espadrilles in satin with a grosgrain trim around the top and a braided jute trim around the soles. Satin linings, jute insoles and rubber soles.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Long-sleeved dresses in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flounced skirt.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Scarf in a soft, textured knit with ribbed edges at the short sides.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Sleeveless dress in cotton seersucker with elastication at the top and rope-look shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
